resources.string: Hello, my name is Airon, I\'m Brazilian and I\'m 29 years old. I am married and my wife\'s name is Alexandra. She is Peruvian. We have a beautiful five months old baby called Dylan.\n\n I love to travel and get to know nature. The photos below, I took of Machu Picchu when my wife and I visited it in 2017. It is an incredible place and I was amazed by it\'s beauty. To visualize that place surrounded by mountains seemed to me something magical.
